articles.author: Daniel Victor
articles.title: Boeing 737 Crashes in Iran Shortly After Takeoff
articles.description: The plane, which was carrying 180 people and bound for Ukraine, went down near Tehran because of technical problems, according to local news reports.
articles.content:
A Boeing 737 carrying 180 people crashed shortly after takeoff from Tehran because of technical problems, according to the Iranian Students News Agency, a state-run media agency. 
The conditions of the passengers and crew were not immediately known.
The pla… [+50 chars]

articles.author: MEGAN SPECIA and Amber Bracken
articles.title: Thanks to Inuit midwives, Canada’s indigenous women can give birth where the family is
articles.description: It's part of Canada's move to heal relations with its indigenous populations. For many years, women were pressured to travel south to give birth in hospitals where their language and traditions weren't understood.
articles.content:
INUKJUAK, Quebec The womans moans of pain mingled with the intermittent beeping of the fetal heartbeat monitor. Her midwife gently coached her in their mother tongue, Inuktitut, as the morning sun cast a cool light across the floor.
